original_solution_mapping.L1: In one week there will be 50+20=<<50+20=70>>70 seashells
original_solution_mapping.L2: In two weeks there will be 70+20=<<70+20=90>>90 seashells
original_solution_mapping.L3: In three weeks there will be 90+20=<<90+20=110>>110 seashells
original_solution_mapping.L4: In four weeks there will be 110+20=<<110+20=130>>130 seashells

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6976.
    Returns: the number of seashells in a month.
    """
    # L1
    current_week_seashells = 50 # 50 seashells in the jar this week
    increase_per_week = 20 # 20 more seashells
    seashells_week_1 = current_week_seashells + increase_per_week

    # L2
    seashells_week_2 = seashells_week_1 + increase_per_week

    # L3
    seashells_week_3 = seashells_week_2 + increase_per_week

    # L4
    seashells_week_4 = seashells_week_3 + increase_per_week

    # FA
    answer = seashells_week_4
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: In one week there will be {current_week_seashells}+{increase_per_week}=<<{current_week_seashells}+{increase_per_week}={seashells_week_1}>>{seashells_week_1} seashells
In two weeks there will be {seashells_week_1}+{increase_per_week}=<<{seashells_week_1}+{increase_per_week}={seashells_week_2}>>{seashells_week_2} seashells
In three weeks there will be {seashells_week_2}+{increase_per_week}=<<{seashells_week_2}+{increase_per_week}={seashells_week_3}>>{seashells_week_3} seashells
In four weeks there will be {seashells_week_3}+{increase_per_week}=<<{seashells_week_3}+{increase_per_week}={seashells_week_4}>>{seashells_week_4} seashells
